solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    // 9.3 70 years diaoZhaTian China jiaYou --newline--    public int hIndex(int[] citations) {--newline--        int length = citations.length;--newline--        if (length == 0) {--newline--            return 0;--newline--        }--newline--        --newline--        int[] array2 = new int[length + 1];--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {--newline--            if (citations[i] > length) {--newline--                array2[length] += 1;--newline--            } else {--newline--                array2[citations[i]] += 1;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        int t = 0;--newline--        int result = 0;--newline----newline--        for (int i = length; i >= 0; i--) {--newline--            t = t + array2[i];--newline--            if (t >= i) {--newline--                return i;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return 0;--newline--    }--newline--}
